meanings.sent1: She besmudged her hands while playing in the mud.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic besmudged his overalls while fixing the car.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy besmudged the clean floor with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: The rain besmudged the once pristine sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The children's faces were besmudged with chocolate after the party.

meanings.sent1: The besmudged windows made it hard to see outside.
meanings.sent2: The old book had besmudged pages from years of use.
meanings.sent3: The besmudged cat looked like it had been rolling in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The besmudged walls of the cave told a story of ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The besmudged mirror reflected a distorted image of the room.
